distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ghostscript to version 9.52 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-12268: Fixed a heap-based buffer overflow in jbig2_image_compose (bsc#1170603).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: jbig2_image_compose in jbig2_image.c in Artifex jbig2dec before 0.18 has a heap-based buffer overflow.
notes.title: CVE description
